name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
description:
Expert only. The time to wait, in milliseconds, between failover
    attempts increases exponentially as a function of the number of
    attempts made so far, with a random factor of +/- 50%. This option
    specifies the base value used in the failover calculation. The
    first failover will retry immediately. The 2nd failover attempt
    will delay at least hadoop.security.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
    milliseconds. And so on.

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.max.lock.hold.time
description: The BlockReportProcessingThread max write lock hold time in ms.

name: dfs.image.parallel.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when dfs.image.parallel.load is
        enabled. This setting should be less than
        dfs.image.parallel.target.sections. The optimal number of
        threads will depend on the hardware and environment.

name: dfs.client.max.block.acquire.failures
description: Maximum failures allowed when trying to get block information from a specific datanode.
